scripts.debug-build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && rd /s /q "C:\digiBlue\android\app\src\main\res\drawable-mdpi" && rd /s /q "C:\digiBlue\\android\app\src\main\res\raw" && cd android && gradlew assembleDebug && cd .. && npm run debug-run-android
scripts.release-build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && rd /s /q "C:\digiBlue\\android\app\src\main\res\drawable-mdpi" && rd /s /q "C:\digiBlue\\android\app\src\main\res\raw" && cd android && gradlew assembleRelease && cd .. && npm run release-run-android
